title: Android 13 DP1: Pixel Launcher supports two homescreen layouts, surely for foldables
content:
Android 12L was all about preparing “stock” Android for foldables and improving the experience on bigger screens. Now, in the first developer preview for Android 13, we’re getting a first look at the Pixel Launcher’s new ability to support multiple display layouts on one device, almost certainly for future foldables.

more…

The post Android 13 DP1: Pixel Launcher supports two homescreen layouts, surely for foldables appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 13 tweaks Google's Pixel 3 launcher to support two homescreen layouts, a change surely meant for foldable devices.
